item.title: mt3 rewind before Matrix
item.description: 20:25 Saturday 09 September 2017 JST Two livestreams from today, the second one being of me trying to figure out how to copy / reverse some frames in Dragonframe, plus messing with OBS a bit. I need to add 20 minutes to the total count because I forgot to start the second live stream on time.. https://youtu.be/N_9ocOflC9I https://youtu.be/6YlM3UT467E Before compressing month information, I had spent 50 hours on MT3 so far.
